This issue sounds a lot like a similar issue that I've encountered when building a Facebook application. When I attempted to simply plant the Facebook Javascript on ANY webpage, the callback URL for auth did not match the origin page. Auth failed. The solution was to use the Facebook library developed by Kynetx or embed an iFrame on the target page, with the source for the iFrame being a URL that I control and can use as the callback URL for Facebook auth.
